description: AWS Ground Station config resource type for CloudFormation.

JsonString.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[{}\[\]:.,"0-9A-z\-_\s]{1,8192}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ConfigData.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: dBW  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Number  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: GHz | MHz | kHz  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No

---

Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([a-zA-Z0-9_\-=/]|\{satellite_id\}|\{config\-name}|\{s3\-config-id}|\{year\}|\{month\}|\{day\}){1,900}$  
Update requires: No interruption
